response.overview: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind. The plan turns sour when the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.
response.tagline: In order to trap him, he must become him.
response.title: Face/Off

titles.title: Face Off - Im Körper des Feindes
Face Off - Due facce di un assassino
